Text: the same songs for 3 mothes X(
thats why i include everything under number 40... the debuts of the week!... i thought the same thing myself at one stage.. that i was more or less posting the same week in, week out... :)

Hey man! atyre07's comment had me thinking, have you ever considered uploading the Promo Only listings? Particularly Mainstream Radio (http://www.promoonly.com/view_format.php?IssueTitleID=15). Someone used to do it a while back but they stopped, and my internet is a bitch so it's difficult to get the monthly releases now. But anyway, thanks for the top 40 releases :D
